About Me

Let me tell you a few things...

BIO

My name is Charles Cabico. I'm a Graphic Designer and Web Designer. I create awesome print and web designs. I define myself as a loyal, adaptable, self motivated, confident and down to earth person, which means that I am smart and fun. I breathe, eat, and live design... I also speak two languages, Tagalog and English, how cool is that?

• I THINK

My passion for design is much more than sitting in front of a computer and make ugly things to look beautiful, design is to inspire people's mind everyday with my work with the Creativity is in my blood, business in my brain.

• I DON'T WANT

Just to get a job, I WANT THE JOB!!! I'm ready for the challenge, no matter the task, I'm willing to do whatever it takes to prove that hiring me is a good decision.

Centro Escolar University

Student

"Mabuhay ka, mahal naming pamantansan" that's our CEU Hymn, my blockmates and I used to sing that loudy in our room or even on the streets and we were just so happy singing it, and it doesn't matter if there's anyone around us.

Step Asia Inc.

Intern as an IT Support

Step Asia Inc. is a company who specialized in the field of tax credits and tax refunds. It's been a great journey for me to be part of their company in a short period of time. I learnt how to troubleshoot simple and complex problems in computers, laptops and networks.
